T02D3711:78b-1: tattva s'a ra sam gra ha /

T02D3711:96b-37: 'bad pa de goms par byed pa la cung zad

T02D3711:96b-39: skye ba gzhan du 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D3711:96b-40: de ltar gzhan gyi rgol ba'i dogs pa bsal nas /
T02D3711:96b-41: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur ba de ltar bstan pa yin no //
T02D3711:96b-43: bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas
T02D3711:96b-44: de'i 'og tu bla ma gcig nas gcig tu brgyud
T02D3711:96b-45: pa'i rim gyis bla na med pa'i ye shes bstan
T02D3711:96b-46: pa de la theg pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pas
T02D3711:96b-47: tshe 'di nyid la lo par shes pa spangs nas
T02D3711:96b-48: yang dag pa'i ye shes 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes
T02D3711:97a-2: gang gi phyir gang thog ma med pa'i tshul can
T02D3711:97a-3: gyi ma rig pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa'i log pa'i
T02D3711:97a-4: rang bzhin las dang nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid can
T02D3711:97a-5: skye ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa
T02D3711:97a-6: skad cig ma gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i bdag
T02D3711:97a-7: nyid can 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni
T02D3711:97a-8: shin tu rgal bar dka' ba yin te /
T02D3711:97a-9: de ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i thub pa dpag
T02D3711:97a-10: tu med pa rnams kyis skye ba grangs med par
T02D3711:97a-12: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pas dge
T02D3711:97a-13: ba'i las sna tshogs pa la sogs pa la goms
T02D3711:97a-14: par byas pa'i dga' bas dus shin tu yun ring
T02D3711:97a-15: po zhig na spong bar byed do zhes de ltar
T02D3711:97a-16: nyan thos kyi theg pa las bshad de /
T02D3711:97a-17: de bas na tshe 'di nyid la theg pa chen
T02D3711:97a-18: po'i rnal 'byor pas log pa'i shes pa spangs te
T02D3711:97a-19: / yang dag pa'i shes pa 'thob par ji ltar 'gyur /
T02D3711:97a-21: theg pa chen po'i rnal 'byor bas tshe rabs snga
T02D3711:97a-22: ma ngag tu phyin ci ma log pa'i thabs la
T02D3711:97a-23: bslabs pa dang / theg pa mchog la gnas pa'i
T02D3711:97a-24: rang bzhin gyi che ba bdag nyid che ba nyid
T02D3711:97a-25: bslabs pa dang / dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba la mi g-yel bar 'bod pa nyid dang /
T02D3711:97a-26: yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi thabs kyis man ngag dang /
T02D3711:97a-27: de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi shugs drag po bsgom pa la goms pa'i phyir /
T02D3711:97a-28: tshe 'di nyid la ye shes thob par 'gyur ba yin no //
T02D3711:97a-30: 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas la sogs
T02D3711:97a-31: pa tshe 'di nyid la phyin ci ma log pa'i
T02D3711:97a-32: thabs kyis man ngag bsgoms pa goms par mdzad pas
T02D3711:97a-33: rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa la bzhugs
T02D3711:97a-34: shing sbyin pa la sogs pa'i sa la sogs pa'i
T02D3711:97a-35: pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang
T02D3711:97a-36: / ye shes dang skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i ye shes brnyes pa yin no //
T02D3711:97a-37: de ltar de rnams tshe 'di nyid la las dang nyon mongs pa dang /
T02D3711:97a-38: shes bya'i sgrib pa'i mtshan nyid can log pa'i shes
T02D3711:97a-39: pa spangs nas yang dag pa'i ye shes thob bo
T02D3711:97a-40: zhes thos la / de bzhin du gzhan dag las 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T02D3711:97a-41: gang gi phyir rgya che ba'i chos nyid kyi bdag
T02D3711:97a-42: nyid che ba 'di ni rang bzhin gyis yod pa
T02D3711:97b-0: ma yin no // de ltar yang sdong po bkod pa'i @97b mdo las //
T02D3711:97b-1: dper na me yis shing gi ri //
T02D3711:97b-2: skad cig gis ni thal bar byed //
T02D3711:97b-3: ye shes me yis rnal 'byor pa'i //
T02D3711:97b-4: las kun skad cig dag gis bsreg / las kyi bag chags ldan pa yi //
T02D3711:97b-5: kun rdzob dus ni ring po can //
T02D3711:97b-6: rnal 'byor ye shes bag chags kyis //
T02D3711:97b-7: thams cad skad cig gis 'jig byed //
T02D3711:97b-8: dper na mun pa rab gtugs pa //
T02D3711:97b-9: mar mes skad cig ngag gis 'joms //
T02D3711:97b-10: thub pas ye shes sgron ma yis //
T02D3711:97b-11: mi shes 'di ni sel bar mdzad //
T02D3711:97b-13: de ltar na gnyis su med pa'i ye shes ni
T02D3711:97b-14: thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyi mchog tu blang bar
T02D3711:97b-15: bya ba'i de kho na nyid ji ltar yin /
T02D3711:97b-16: de ltar lung dang rigs pa dag gis bstan pa yin no //
T02D3711:97b-17: 'dir byis pa rnams kyi blo'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i
T02D3711:97b-18: 'bras bu yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par
T02D3711:97b-20: da ni theg pa chen po la lhag par mos
T02D3711:97b-21: pa'i dad pa can gyi rigs kyi bus gsol ba
T02D3711:97b-22: btab pa dag la spro ba bskyed cing thar pa
T02D3711:97b-23: ma lus pa 'dod pa la sngar bshad pa'i mtshan
T02D3711:97b-24: nyid can gyis ye shes rtogs par bya ba'i phyir
T02D3711:97b-25: thabs nye bar bstan pas na /
T02D3711:97b-26: bdag dang gzhan gyi don rab tu grub par bya
T02D3711:97b-27: ba'i phyir shes rab kyi tshul rjes su dran nas
T02D3711:97b-28: de bstan pa'i man ngag bsgom pa'i rim pa'i cho
T02D3711:97b-29: ga 'dir cung zad cig bshad par bya'o //
T02D3711:97b-30: theg pa chen por ji skad du bshad pa'i ye shes mngon par rtogs pa dang /
T02D3711:97b-31: gus pa dang ldan pas de'i tshul las bshad pa'i
T02D3711:97b-32: cho ga'i rim par sngon du 'gro bas bla ma
T02D3711:97b-34: de'i drin gyis thob pa'i lung gis bla na med
T02D3711:97b-35: pa'i ye shes kyi man ngag gi rnal 'byor bsgom
T02D3711:97b-37: de la dang po re zhig / bstan bcos rgya chen po ni thos nas su //
T02D3711:97b-38: don dam de bzhin nyid ni nges byas la //
T02D3711:97b-39: dad ldan de ni 'jam pa'i stan gnas te //
T02D3711:97b-40: blo dang ldan pas rnal 'byor rtsom par byed //
T02D3711:97b-41: gzung dang 'dzin dang gnyi ga gnyis min dang //
T02D3711:97b-42: bdag dang gzhan dang mya ngan 'das pa dang //
T02D3711:97b-43: 'khor ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog mang po ni //
T02D3711:97b-44: rab tu spangs la yid ni mnyam par bzhag / sgyu ma dri za'i grong khyer lta bur ni //
T02D3711:98a-2: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje yis //
T02D3711:98a-3: lus kyi 'khrul 'khor rab tu gzhig par bya //
T02D3711:98a-4: rnam pa thams cad du ni rab mdzes la //
T02D3711:98a-5: thog dang tha ma'i cha bral rnam mi rig / dri ma med pa'i 'od zer stong gis ni //
T02D3711:98a-6: mun pa nges bsal mkha' dang mtshungs pa yi //
T02D3711:98a-7: rang gi rnam pa tsam gyi ngo bo ru //
T02D3711:98a-8: gzod nas skye ba med pa'i rang sems mthong //
T02D3711:98a-9: gang gis kyang ni de mthong gyur pa dag / de yang de bzhin du ni blta bar bya //
T02D3711:98a-10: dmigs pa med pa dang bcas pa'i sems nyid ni //
T02D3711:98a-11: de bzhin nyid dang yang dag mtha' ru bshad //
T02D3711:98a-12: de ltar rim gyis bslabs par gyur pa las //
T02D3711:98a-13: ming du shes pa 'gog pa 'thob par 'gyur //
T02D3711:98a-14: de la yang dag reg par sbyor ba las //
T02D3711:98a-15: 'bad pa med par mngon shes lnga ldan 'gyur //
T02D3711:98a-16: de dang mngon par ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02D3711:98a-17: 'gro ba'i don ni dpag tu med pa byed //
T02D3711:98a-18: 'di ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor ba //
T02D3711:98a-19: shin tu yun ring dus su gnas par 'gyur //
T02D3711:98a-20: lus ni rdo rje lta bur mi shigs shing //
T02D3711:98a-21: nyon mongs bdud la sogs pas g-yo mi 'gyur //
T02D3711:98a-22: shes rab pha rol phyin pa zhes bya ba'i //
T02D3711:98a-23: rnal 'byor 'di dang rtag tu rab ldan pas//
T02D3711:98a-24: nam mkha' mdzod la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
T02D3711:98a-25: mang po rnams ni yang dag rdzogs par 'gyur //
T02D3711:98a-26: 'di zab mo'i don gang ci yang rung ba rtogs
T02D3711:98a-27: dka' ba de ni bla ma'i zhal nas cho ga
T02D3711:98a-28: ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa gzung bar bya'o
T02D3711:98a-29: // rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa
T02D3711:98a-30: dang ldan pa gang la la pha rol tu phyin
T02D3711:98a-31: pa'i tshul gyis spyad pa spyod pa ji skad du
T02D3711:98a-32: bshad pa'i rim pa'i cho gas sems can thams cad
T02D3711:98a-33: gdon par bya ba'i phyir sems bskyed nas /
T02D3711:98a-34: bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi man ngag gi
T02D3711:98a-35: rnal 'byor ba brtsams nas brtson 'grus dang ldan pas
T02D3711:98a-36: bslabs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa de ni ring po
T02D3711:98a-37: mi thogs par tshe 'di nyid la ji skad du
T02D3711:98a-38: bshad pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D3711:98a-39: gang yang ji skad du bshad pa'i cho ga med
T02D3711:98a-40: pa'i glegs bam tsam la brten pa tsam gyis 'ju
T02D3711:98a-41: par de dag ji skad du bshad pa'i dngos grub
T02D3711:98b-0: la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur zhing sdug @98b bsngal
T02D3711:98b-1: dang yid mi bde ba sna tshogs pa dag 'byung
T02D3711:98b-2: bar 'gyur ro zhes zab mo'i tshul la de bzhin
T02D3711:98b-5: bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i shugs kyi dbang
T02D3711:98b-6: gis theg pa chen po la lhag par mos shing
T02D3711:98b-7: thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyi mchog tu blang bar
T02D3711:98b-8: bya ba nyid du dbang po dman pa dang /
T02D3711:98b-10: chen po'i dbye bas theg pa chen po'i tshul khrims dbye ba rnam pa gsum du gsungs la /
T02D3711:98b-11: dbye ba gsum po de dag nyid bcom ldan 'das
T02D3711:98b-12: 'dul ba'i bsam pa mang po'i dbang gis dbye ba
T02D3711:98b-13: mang po'i mtshan nyid la 'jug par mdzad pa yin
T02D3711:98b-14: la / de rnams kyang thabs kyi dbye bas phye
T02D3711:98b-15: ba yin gyi thabs las 'byung ba las ni khyad
T02D3711:98b-16: par med do zhes bshad do /
T02D3711:98b-17: de rnams las gong nas gong du khyad par du
T02D3711:98b-18: 'phags pa'i mtshan nyid can thams cad kyis rab mchog
T02D3711:98b-19: gi khyad par ni sngags kyi theg pa yin par
T02D3711:98b-20: gsungs la ; de bas na sngags kyi theg pa'i
T02D3711:98b-21: khyad par gang yin pa de ni brjod par bya
T02D3711:98b-22: gsungs la ; ste / tshul gsum gyi sgron ma las //
T02D3711:98b-23: don gcig na yang ma rmongs dang //
T02D3711:98b-24: thabs mang dka' ba med pa dang //
T02D3711:98b-25: dbang po rnon po'i dbang mdzad pas //
T02D3711:98b-26: sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags //
T02D3711:98b-28: de bzhin du dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi tshul las //
T02D3711:98b-29: bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02D3711:98b-30: byang chub sems dpa' kun kyang yin //
T02D3711:98b-31: de bas rang lha'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D3711:98b-32: bdag nyid nye bar bsgrub par bya //
T02D3711:98b-37: dgod dam rab tu smra ba'am //
T02D3711:98b-38: gang dang gang du ji ltar gnas //
T02D3711:98b-39: dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa'am //
T02D3711:98b-40: sgrib pa kun dang ldan yang rung //
T02D3711:98b-41: rang lha'i sbyor ba'i bdag nyid can //
T02D3711:98b-45: mtshams med lnga la sogs pa yi //
T02D3711:98b-46: sdig pa chen po byed pa yang //
T02D3711:98b-47: theg pa bla na med pa yi //
T02D3711:98b-50: yang de'i khyad par gsungs pa ni /
T02D3711:98b-51: bde bas byang chub thob 'gyur gyi //
T02D3711:99a-2: gang phyir ting 'dzin las byung ba'i //
T02D3711:99a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs pa yin no //
T02D3711:99a-5: de ltar ji skad du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid can
T02D3711:99a-6: gyi sngags kyi theg pa chen po ni dka' ba
T02D3711:99a-7: med pa'i spyod pas skad cig ma gcig la mngon
T02D3711:99a-8: par byang chub pa thob par byed pa yin zhing
T02D3711:99a-9: / gong nas gong du phyin ci ma log pa'i
T02D3711:99a-10: thabs kyis khyad par du bcom ldan 'das thugs rje
T02D3711:99a-11: chen po'i dbang gis gang gsungs pa de /
T02D3711:99a-12: de kho na nyid kyi snying po bsdus pa 'dir bstan tan zhes 'dir brjod par bya ste /
T02D3711:99a-13: 'di na da ltar srid pa'i lam du da ltar skyes pa dang /
T02D3711:99a-14: skye bar 'gyur ba'i sems can mthong ba dang //
T02D3711:99a-15: thos pa rnams ni sngags kyi spyod pa'i snod ji lta ba ma yin no //
T02D3711:99a-16: de yang re zhig da ltar byung ba rnams ni
T02D3711:99a-17: ma rig pa'i dbang gis bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin
T02D3711:99a-18: pa la sogs pa lta ba ngan pa'i shing gis
T02D3711:99a-19: sbar ba'i mes rgyud bsregs pa /
T02D3711:99a-20: rang gi rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gis blo rnam
T02D3711:99a-21: par g-yengs pa dman pa'i blo can log par 'dzin
T02D3711:99a-22: pa la mngon par zhen pa sna tshogs pa'i rims
T02D3711:99a-23: kyis btab pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i nyam thag pa
T02D3711:99a-24: nyon mongs pa'i dpa' rlabs kyis blo rnam par g-yengs
T02D3711:99a-25: pa de rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi tshul las bstan
T02D3711:99a-26: pa'i phyin ci ma log pa'i thabs kyi khyad par
T02D3711:99a-27: zab mo rnam par phye ba'i mtshan nyid can /
T02D3711:99a-28: shin tu rgya che ba'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i spyod pa spyad par ga la nus /
T02D3711:99a-29: de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i sems can
T02D3711:99a-30: nyid la dgongs nas sngon bcom ldan 'das thams cad
T02D3711:99a-31: mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa nyid kyis ma 'ongs
T02D3711:99a-32: pa'i sems can rnams kyi spyod pa mkhyen nas sngags
T02D3711:99a-33: kyi tshul la dgag pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D3711:99a-34: de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi theg pa tshul las //
T02D3711:99a-35: shas rab de ni mi shes shing ;
T02D3711:99a-36: / ngar 'dzin dri mas spags pa rnams //
T02D3711:99a-38: dmyal bar 'gro ba kho nar zad //
T02D3711:99a-41: thabs bzang rnam par spangs nas ni //
T02D3711:99a-42: 'gal ba'i dam tshig la sogs pa //
T02D3711:99b-0: gang zhig gzhan du byed pa dag / de ni @99b du 'bod dag tu 'tshed //
T02D3711:99b-2: rtsva dang shing la sogs pa'i tshogs //
T02D3711:99b-3: bcug pa thal ba nyid 'gyur gyis //
T02D3711:99b-4: slar ni rab tu skye mi 'gyur //
T02D3711:99b-5: de bzhin de nyid rnam bral bar //
T02D3711:99b-6: shin tu rmad byung las byed pa //
T02D3711:99b-7: ji srid nam mkha' gnas par du //
T02D3711:99b-11: legs brtags legs par dpyad nas ni //
T02D3711:99b-12: mkhas pas rab tu 'jug bya yin //
T02D3711:99b-13: gzhan du mer ni 'jug pa yis //
T02D3711:99b-14: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
T02D3711:99b-18: lhag par mos par nges brten gang //
T02D3711:99b-19: des grub 'gyur gyi gzhan du de //
T02D3711:99b-20: dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur //
T02D3711:99b-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs pas
T02D3711:99b-22: sems can phal ba rnams la sngags kyi tshul bstan
T02D3711:99b-23: pa dgag par mdzad pa yin no //
T02D3711:99b-24: kho bo cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgag par gsungs pa'i bka' 'di nyid kyis /
T02D3711:99b-25: de kho na nyid kyi snying po bsdus pa 'dir
T02D3711:99b-26: gsang sngags kyi tshul la bstan pa'i thabs kyi khyad
T02D3711:99b-27: par ma bstan pa yin no //
T02D3711:99b-28: theg chen don ni cung zad cig / btus nas snying por bsdus pa la //
T02D3711:99b-29: gang 'dir cung zad mi gsal ba //
T02D3711:99b-30: de ni gzhan du legs par brtag /'di ni chos grangs la sogs pas //
T02D3711:99b-31: dbu ma'i lung du mang por ni //
T02D3711:99b-32: spros pas rnam par phye bas na //
T02D3711:99b-33: rnam par rmongs pa bshol ba yin //
T02D3711:99b-34: theg chen la dga'i bdag nyid can //
T02D3711:99b-35: sems can dang po'i las can rnams //
T02D3711:99b-36: yang dag de nyid rtogs pa'i phyir //
T02D3711:99b-37: de nyid snying po bdag gis bshad //
T02D3711:99b-38: snying rje bdud rtsi'i ros brlan cing //
T02D3711:99b-39: sems can don la dga' sems kyis //
T02D3711:99b-40: dad pas byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir //
T02D3711:99b-41: nga yis 'di ni bsdus pa yin //
T02D3711:99b-42: 'dir gang blo gros dman gyur pa 'am //
T02D3711:99b-43: ma dpyad par ni gang byas pa //
T02D3711:99b-44: cung zad rgol bcas de dag kun //
T02D3711:99b-45: mkhas pas bdag la bzod par mdzad //
T02D3711:99b-46: de nyid bdud rtsi dag pa 'dis //
T02D3711:99b-47: thugs rjes rgyud ni dag pa yin //
T02D3711:99b-48: de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs gzhan //
T02D3711:99b-49: nyer longs spyod don ma rungs yin //
T02D3711:99b-50: de nyid kyis na bshad dka' ba //
T02D3711:99b-51: grub mtha'i rjes 'gro'i blo can la //
T02D3711:100a-2: snying rjes bstan la 'jug pa yin //
T02D3711:100a-3: rang zab shin tu rgya che la //
T02D3711:100a-4: sbyangs pa ma byas bdag nyid can //
T02D3711:100a-5: rmongs pa'i dgra bos bdag gzhan gyi //
T02D3711:100a-6: theg pa che la smod par byed //
T02D3711:100a-7: la la rmongs pas bsgribs nas ni //
T02D3711:100a-8: de nyid la ni 'gegs byed gang //
T02D3711:100a-9: de la bde 'gro'ang yod min na //
T02D3711:100a-10: thar pa thob par ga la 'gyur //
T02D3711:100a-11: theg pa chen po'i tshul gnas pa //
T02D3711:100a-12: bram ze klu yi dbang po'i bu //
T02D3711:100a-13: chos kyi dbang po dpal ldan gyis //
T02D3711:100a-14: de nyid bsdus pa'i snying po byas //
T02D3711:100a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de nyid bdud rtsi mtsho nang nas //
T02D3711:100a-16: 'gro la snying rjes blangs nas yang dag dge ba gang //
T02D3711:100a-17: bstsags pa des ni 'gro ba'i nyes pa kun bsal te //
T02D3711:100a-18: lus can thams cad de bzhin nyid gcig la gzhol
T02D3711:100a-19: shog / de kho na nyid kyi snying po bsdus
